input_args.passage: 'Great Heathen Army | The name Great Heathen Army is derived from the Anglo-Saxon Chronicle. The force was led by three of the five sons of the semi-legendary Ragnar Lodbrok, ...'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we learn that Wessex was believed to be founded by Cerdic and Cynric of the Gewisse, suggesting that the West Saxon forces could have been composed of followers or descendants of these figures.'
